heading: Diablo 4 Season 1 Race to 100 Podcast W/ Host AnnacakeLIVE!
content: In the final moments of gearing up, Maxroll will be hosting a ! The Race to 100 is always a highly entertaining part of any season, steeped in tradition from the Diablo 2 days. The Podcast will cover the race from key moments: With that, let's cut to the specifics! : The podcast will be taking place on : The Season Opening Podcast will take place 30 minutes the season has started (10:30am Each Podcast will be approximately 2 hours long. Each one of the four will be centered around the four races called out in the introduction! : We have a ton of guests planned. A butch of the members will join the Podcast as well as a few greater Diablo Community members! that will be updated as the race progresses! To see who is where, head on over and bookmark it! Our focus for the start of Season 1 is to get all our current Build Guides updated with the new while we navigate new builds that reveal themselves. We're continuing to work on more updates for ! More news coming this week, stay tuned! If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Written by: Reviewed by:
